enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve attribute manipulation, making attr(String) a suitable setup for testing removeAttr(String).
hasAttr(String) can be used to verify the presence of an attribute before removal, enhancing the test setup for removeAttr(String).
Setting an attribute with attr(String,String) before calling removeAttr(String) ensures the attribute exists for removal.
hasAttr(String) can be used to verify the absence of an attribute after removal, enhancing the test verification for removeAttr(String).
